name: Sun Escapes Me
description:
Controls

Use the arrow keys for your movement. 

What is?

An "OMG THE SUN IS EXPLODING AND YOU NEED TO ESCAPE"... game.

Asteroids knock you back and nebulas seize up your engine for a brief time. 

The sun wants to eat you up and make you 'splode like so many gibs. Space gibs!

Why is?

Made for the LOWREZJAM 2022 game jam! This is actually my (Chaz) first game jam ever! LOWREZJAM was picked because of the 64x64px requirement. It was very much in line with my current experiences with pixel art and the Pico 8 fantasy console.

More will be written as we work on this project. Chaz (https://twitter.com/thechaz) and Cat(https://twitter.com/LNJcat) are the contributors to Sun Escapes Me.
